attributes.title: Trump has a small pp
attributes.review: guys I have definitive proof that trump has the smallest pp out of all the presidents. so I downloaded the app like normal(it took literally took 69 hours to download[probably because trump loves doing that with pence]) and when I finally got into the app, trump himself texted me and said that he would give me a small loan of a million dollars if I clicked the link he sent me!! I was like “hell yeah!!” and I clicked the link, but it sent me to a site with a picture of trump, the president of the United States of America’s tiny peen!!! He must’ve been trying to give me a virus just like he probably gave all the teens he did the dirty with STDs, but accidentally sent me to a picture of his pp instead!!!! I’m not joking when I say it was less than an inch. it was literally just the pp tip. anyway this app is terrible I would not recommend!! please deport this app like you deport so many innocent families, ONE STAR!!!!

attributes.title: Virus😤
attributes.review: I downloaded the app in hopes of supporting Mr. President but my phone was almost immediately riddled with viruses. I feel as though the President along side his staff could have prevented the spread of these viruses but instead focused only on catering to his personal needs and beliefs. He obviously does not want to serve or help the people of America. Alongside the virus, my phone began to act slower and couldn’t comprehend basic statements and facts. I believe this to be because of the Presidents own personal issues with being slow and lacking basic comprehension skills. I would say I hope he fixes the problems listed and the several others not listed but truly I don’t think him capable. So I’ll have to delete the app so as to better the functionality of my phone. Maybe we should consider deleting some things in America so as to improve the functioning of the government:)

attributes.title: VERY UGLY NO KISS FOR HIM😾
attributes.review: i was very excited to download this app after i heard about it from my good friend karen😻  while in the process of downloading it, my phone stared to turn orange from the left corner very slowly. i was very scared and worried about what was happening to my phone🙀 i wondered to myself. is this what trump wanted ? he wanted me to downloaded an app to ruin my phone ?😾 this didn’t happen to my good friend karen’s phone🙄 but then i mediated for a bit. why am i supporting trump really? ugh he’s so orange and racist👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽🙄🙄 and a rapist why is he even president? his only supporters are white straight cis gender males. one woman who supported him told me that they hope to get rxped by him after i told her he raped a girl👁👄👁 his supporters need serious help. this app is so terrible i had to delete it cuz it almost ruined my phone completely. i am also no longer a trump fan. 🧍🏽‍♂️🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮😾👎🏽🙄😹🦆

attributes.title: FALSE ADVERTISINg, is it HACKED?
attributes.review:
Recently I’ve gotten really into musical instruments, and started to take trumpet lessons. I downloaded this app in hopes of joining a trumpet community, to share my progress with. When I open the app I am immediately met with the most horrendous picture of an orange walrus. I think, ok, that’s weird. I continue scrolling, only to be met with many disturbing pictures of a very ugly man. Everyone was referring to this orange thing as “trumpe” I think? Either this app is a COMPLETE troll or they have very weak security, and have been completely hacked and taken over. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! And the crazies thing is, I didn’t see a single thing about trumpets. False advertising. 

Edit —
I tried deleting the app and it wouldn’t let me! Now I’ve been getting suspicious spam calls. 3 in 1 hour. This is crazy and should not  in any circumstances be aloud. Please take this app off the App Store.

attributes.title: THIS REVIEW IF FROM AN ACTUAL TRUMP SUPPORTER
attributes.review:
According to all known laws

of aviation,

  

there is no way a bee

should be able to fly.

  

Its wings are too small to get

its fat little body off the ground.

  

The bee, of course, flies anyway

  

because bees don't care

what humans think is impossible.

  

Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  

Ooh, black and yellow!

Let's shake it up a little.

  

Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  

Ooming!

  

Hang on a second.

  

Hello?

  

- Barry?

- Adam?

  

- Oan you believe this is happening?

- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  

Looking sharp.

  

Use the stairs. Your father

paid good money for those.

  

Sorry. I'm excited.

  

Here's the graduate.

We're very proud of you, son.

  

A perfect report card, all B's.

  

Very proud.

  

Ma! I got a thing going here.

  

- You got lint on your fuzz.

- Ow! That's me!

  

- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.

- Bye!

  

Barry, I told you,

stop flying in the house!

  

- Hey, Adam.

- Hey, Barry.

  

- Is that fuzz gel?

- A little. Special day, graduation.

  

Never thought I'd make it.

  

Three days grade school,

three days high school.

  

Those were awkward.

  

Three days college. I'm glad I took

a day and hitchhiked around the hive.

  

You did come back different.

  

- Hi, Barry.

- Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good.

  

- Hear about Frankie?

- Yeah.

attributes.title: The AUDACITY
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to pledge my loyalty to Daddy T and was not disappointed UNTIL my phone wouldn't stop vibrating AND before I could use my phone for another use( if you know what I mean;)) just thinking about that fine Cheeto puff of a man, my phone starts getting a ton of notifications and I realize that it's actually a sick beat BUT before I could dish out a fatty verse about how ”real women vote for Trump” I am BEREAVED to find that my has overheated, BUT I pass the time by throwing dishware at a certain first lady’s portrait who somehow found it's way onto a shooting target( I don't know how that got there) and found that my phone was now cold to the touch, just like Daddy T when a reporter asks a relevant question, I then find that my phone is full of viruses, but knowing Daddy T, he won't acknowledge the fact that everyone who gets this app has viruses until it's too late. Trump 2020

attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. attributes.title: i- please delete this app 😰🤮
attributes.review: So you know i get this app right and the first thing i see is a round cheese! and i’m like “OMG” like my eyes were okay until i saw the round cheese! and i was like “omg did they put a WIG on the cheese!” i mean i was scared and my brother came in like “why are you screaming?” and i showed him and now he needs glasses like- and then my mom cane in and was like “oh no we must take him to the eye doctor” but i realized that corona is still here because of the round cheese with a wig! so i was like “MOM NO we have corona!!” and she was like “omg is this really happing” like my last 2 brain cells gone. now i think i’ll just think about what happened..but still! why is this app here so many bad things have happened to my family because of it 😥 like things  were bad already THIS APP MADE IT WORSE!!! now i go to starbucks and always a get a depresso because of this app :( why was this made?

attributes.title: It’s a no from me 🥱
attributes.review: I downloaded the app thinking it would help me and the United States but all it did was bring me stress and unhappiness. I didn’t think when I opened the app I would see this disgustingly ugly horrific orange pig to look at but I did sadly. I do NOT want this “thing” running the country anymore he has caused enough distress to the people and we want our lives back, not to live in fear. The president has ran over my whole family and cut off each and everyone one of their toes and made me watch him eat them in front of me while crying, he then would threaten to make me eat some if I didn’t stop crying. He then found all of my friends and threw multiple fridges at them and made them feed him mushrooms in the White House bathroom, they all were traumatized as one would be and cried with me. But anyways this app almost killed me❤️ do better trump 🧚✨🦋😹💕🌻 #blacklivesmatter

attributes.title: Trump Glitch?!?!
attributes.review: First off, I downloaded this app so that I can be INFORMED on our current cheeseball (that means president where I’m from) and I am beyond disappointed! Upon clicking download, my phone completely shut off, and when it turned on the only image on the screen was a nude photo of Mr. Trump! I’ve been seeing this image circulating the internet and while I’m not sure if it’s photo shopped or not, I am APPALLED that someone so UNPATRIOTIC would hack the apps system and display such an embarrassing photo... my phone doesn’t allow me to change my home or lock screen from the image so now whenever I open my phone I am met with Mr. Presidents Twinkie of a penis. I deleted and then re-downloaded the app to only be met with the same god forsaken image. I don’t want to get rid of the ONLY means of getting fake presidential news I have so I will sadly bear with this issue. Is any one else experiencing this??!?!
